_comment: Add this to .claude/settings.json hooks.PostToolUse array to enable decision-time guidance
_instructions: 1. Add the PostToolUse hook above to your settings.json
2. Ensure orchestrator sessions have CLAUDE_SESSION_ID starting with 'orch-'
3. The hook will automatically track errors and inject guidance when needed
4. For orchestrators, the stop-gate will require blocker escalation before stopping
